Text:
When you read the info about this torrent, up on the left you find "Files", Click on the number of files (4264) then you open a window down showing the whole list.
My meaning: Too many files and too big a mixing. It requires a lot of work to separate the books you may want to keep.

Suggestions taken guys. I've gathered the collection over a long time, from internet as well as from friends and other sources. I'll try and take out some time to organize it properly and upload a different torrent may be...

OMG!!!   This is so fantastic.   Thank you so much.
You are the best.
